author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Stellar Acquisition Reduces Extension Date Of Initial Business Combination To August 24
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Stellar Acquisition III Inc:
* STELLAR ACQUISITION III INC. ANNOUNCES INCREASE IN MONTHLY CONTRIBUTION AMOUNT TO TRUST ACCOUNT POST-EXTENSION APPROVAL AND SHORTENING OF EXTENSION DATE TO AUGUST 24, 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
